## Source: ossf-package-analysis (e8ebea7be43f522c7fd45c4793bcac3b33c5ffafa2dc9ea3e0f28657bc650819)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'quickwebbasicauth' @ 2.3.2 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
